2 #include <string>

4 /*** from azawadzki,
5 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/180947/base64-decode-snippet-in-c
6 */
7 
8 inline std::vector<unsigned char> base64_to_binary(const std::string& in)
9 {
10 
11  std::string out;
12  std::string in_padded;
13 
14  // Add padding
15  if (in_padded.length() % 4 == 2)
16  {
17  in_padded = in + "==";
18  }
19 
20  else if (in_padded.length() % 4 == 3)
21  {
22  in_padded = in + "=";
23  }
24 
25  else
26  {
27  in_padded = in;
28  }
29 
30  std::vector<int> T(256, -1);
31  for (int i = 0; i < 64; i++)
32  T["ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/"[i]] =
33  i;
34 
35  int val = 0, valb = -8;
36  for (unsigned char c : in_padded)
37  {
38  if (T[c] == -1)
39  break;
40  val = (val << 6) + T[c];
41  valb += 6;
42  if (valb >= 0)
43  {
44  out.push_back(char((val >> valb) & 0xFF));
45  valb -= 8;
46  }
47  }
48  return std::vector<unsigned char>(out.begin(), out.end());
49 }
50 
51 inline unsigned getValueAt(std::vector<unsigned char>& bytes,
52  const unsigned int startByteIndex,
53  const unsigned int endByteIndex)
54 {
55  unsigned long out = 0;
56 
57  for (int i = startByteIndex; i <= endByteIndex; i++)
58  {
59  if(i>=bytes.size()) throw std::out_of_range("Out of bounds error while decoding b64.");
60  out = out | ( (0x0000000000000000 | bytes[i]) << 8 * (i-startByteIndex) );
61  }
62  return out;
63 }
64 
65 inline long convertValue(const unsigned long value, const unsigned int size, bool isSigned)
66 {
67  if(!isSigned) return static_cast<unsigned int>(value);
68  unsigned long mask = 0x0000000000000080;
69  mask = mask << (8*(size-1));
70  mask = mask & value;
71  for(int i = 0; i<64-(size*8); i++){
72  mask = mask | (mask << 1);
73  }
74  return value | mask;
75 }
76 
99 inline long base64_decode(const std::string& in,
100  const unsigned int startByteIndex,
101  const unsigned int endByteIndex,
102  const unsigned int size, bool isSigned)
103 {
104  std::vector<unsigned char> bytes = base64_to_binary(in);
105  unsigned long value = getValueAt(bytes, startByteIndex, endByteIndex);
106  return convertValue(value, size, isSigned);
107 }
